arabicText: فِيهِ ءَايَـٰتٌۢ بَيِّنَـٰتٌۭ مَّقَامُ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ۖ وَمَن دَخَلَهُۥ كَانَ ءَامِنًۭا ۗ وَلِلَّهِ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ حِجُّ ٱلْبَيْتِ مَنِ ٱسْتَطَاعَ إِلَيْهِ سَبِيلًۭا ۚ وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِىٌّ عَنِ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
In	it	are	clear	signs	- the	place	where	Ibrahim	
stood	(is	one	of	them);	and	whoever	enters	it	
shall	 be	 safe;	 and	 performing	 the	 Hajj	
(pilgrimage) of	 this	 house,	 for	 the	 sake	 of	
Allah,	 is	 a	 duty	 upon	 mankind,	 for	 those	
who	can	reach	it;	and	whoever	disbelieves
– then	Allah is	Independent	(Unwanting)	of	
the	entire	creation!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Is	meiñ	khuli	nishāniyāñ	haiñ	Ibrāheem ke	
khade	 hone	 ki	 jagah	 aur	 jo	 is	 meiñ	 āye	
amān	meiñ	 ho	aur	Allah	 ke	liye	logoñ	 par	
us	ghar	ka	Haj karna	hai	jo	us	tak	chal	sake	
aur	jo	munkir	ho	to	Allah	sāre	jahān	se	beparwah	hai

arabicText: قُلْ يَـٰٓأَهْلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ لِمَ تَكْفُرُونَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱللَّهُ شَهِيدٌ عَلَىٰ مَا تَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	 Muhammad - peace	
and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“O	People	given	the	Book(s)!	Why	do	you	not	believe	in	the	verses	
(or	signs)	of	Allah,	whereas	your	deeds	are	being	witnessed	by	Allah?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Tum	farmāo	aey	kitābiyoñ!	Allah	ki	Āyateiñ	
kiyuñ	 nahi	 mānte	 aur	 tumhāre	 kām	 Allah	
ke	sāmne	haiñ

arabicText: قُلْ يَـٰٓأَهْلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ لِمَ تَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ مَنْ ءَامَنَ تَبْغُونَهَا عِوَجًۭا وَأَنتُمْ شُهَدَآءُ ۗ وَمَا ٱللَّهُ بِغَـٰفِلٍ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“O	People	given	the	Book(s)!	
Why	 do	 you	 prevent	 those	 who	 have	 accepted	 faith	 from	 the	 way	 of	Allah,	 seeking	 to	 cause	
deviation	in	it,	whereas	you	yourselves	are	witnesses	 to	it?	And	Allah is	not	unaware	of	your	
deeds!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Tum	farmāo	aey	kitābiyoñ!	Kiyuñ	Allah	ki	rāh	se	rokte	ho	usey	jo	Imān	lāye	use	tedhā	kiya	chahte	
ho	aur	tum	khud	is	par	gawāh	ho	aur	Allah	tumhāre	koutakoñ	se	be-khabar	nahi.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِن تُطِيعُوا۟ فَرِيقًۭا مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ يَرُدُّوكُم بَعْدَ إِيمَـٰنِكُمْ كَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	 If	you	obey	some	of	People	given	 the	Book(s),	 they	will	definitely	 turn	
you	into	disbelievers	after	your	having	accepted	faith.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo!	Agar	tum	kuch kitābiyoñ	ke	kahe	par	chale	to	woh	tumhāre	Imān	ke	bād	tumheiñ	
kāfir	kar	chordeñ	ge

arabicText: وَكَيْفَ تَكْفُرُونَ وَأَنتُمْ تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱللَّهِ وَفِيكُمْ رَسُولُهُۥ ۗ وَمَن يَعْتَصِم بِٱللَّهِ فَقَدْ هُدِىَ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍۢ مُّسْتَقِيمٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	 how	 can	 you	 disbelieve,	 whereas	
Allah’s	 verses	 are	 recited	 to	 you	 and	 His	
Noble	 Messenger	 is	 present	 amongst	
you?!	 And	 whoever	 takes	 the	 support	 of	
Allah is	indeed	guided	to	the	right	path
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	tum	kiyuñ	kar	kufr	karoge	tum	par	to	
Allah	 ki	 āyateiñ	 padhi	 jāti	 haiñ	 aur	 tum	
meiñ	us	ka	Rasool	 tashreef	 farma	hai	aur	
jis ne	Allah	ka	sahāra	liya	woh	seedhi	rāh	
dikhāya	gaya

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ تُقَاتِهِۦ وَلَا تَمُوتُنَّ إِلَّا وَأَنتُم مُّسْلِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
. O	 People	 who	 Believe!	 Fear	 Allah in	 the	
manner	 He	 should	 rightfully	 be	 feared,	
and	do	not	die	except	as	Muslims.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Imān	 wālo!	 Allah	 se	 daro	 jaisa	 us	 se	
darne	 ka	 haq	 hai	 aur	 hargiz	 na	 marna	
magar	Musalman

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ تُقَاتِهِۦ وَلَا تَمُوتُنَّ إِلَّا وَأَنتُم مُّسْلِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
. O	 People	 who	 Believe!	 Fear	 Allah in	 the	
manner	 He	 should	 rightfully	 be	 feared,	
and	do	not	die	except	as	Muslims.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Imān	 wālo!	 Allah	 se	 daro	 jaisa	 us	 se	
darne	 ka	 haq	 hai	 aur	 hargiz	 na	 marna	
magar	Musalman

arabicText: وَٱعْتَصِمُوا۟ بِحَبْلِ ٱللَّهِ جَمِيعًۭا وَلَا تَفَرَّقُوا۟ ۚ وَٱذْكُرُوا۟ نِعْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ إِذْ كُنتُمْ أَعْدَآءًۭ فَأَلَّفَ بَيْنَ قُلُوبِكُمْ فَأَصْبَحْتُم بِنِعْمَتِهِۦٓ إِخْوَٰنًۭا وَكُنتُمْ عَلَىٰ شَفَا حُفْرَةٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ فَأَنقَذَكُم مِّنْهَا ۗ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَهْتَدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 hold	 fast	 to	 the	 rope	 of	 Allah,	 all	 of	
you	 together,	and	 do	 not	 be	 divided;	and	
remember	 Allah’s	 favour	 on	 you,	 that	
when	 there	was	enmity	 between	 you,	He	
created	affection	between	your	hearts,	so	
due	to	His	grace	you	became	like	brothers	
to	 each	 other;	 and	 you	were	 on	 the	 edge	
of	a	pit	of	fire	(hell),	so	He	saved	you	from	
it;	this	is	how	Allah explains	His	verses	to	
you,	so	that	you	may	be	guided.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	ki	rassi	mazboot	thām	lo	sab	mil	
kar	aur	āpas	meiñ	phat	na	jāna	aur	Allah	
ka	 ehsān	 apne	 upar	 yād	 karo	 jab	 tum	
meiñ	 bair	 tha	 usne	 tumhāre	 diloñ	 meiñ	
milāp	 kar	 diya	 to	 us	 ke	 fazl	 se	 tum	 āpas	
meiñ	 bhāi	 ho	 gaye	 aur	 tum	 ek	 ghār-edozakh	 ke	 kināre	 par	 they	 to	 us	 ne	
tumheiñ	 us	 se	 bacha	 diya	 Allah	 tum	 se	
yooñ	hi	apni	āyateiñ	bayān	farmāta	hai	ke	
kahiñ	tum	hidāyat	pāo

arabicText: وَلْتَكُن مِّنكُمْ أُمَّةٌۭ يَدْعُونَ إِلَى ٱلْخَيْرِ وَيَأْمُرُونَ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ وَيَنْهَوْنَ عَنِ ٱلْمُنكَرِ ۚ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 there	 should	 be	 a	 group	 among	 you	
that	invites	to	goodness,	and	enjoins	good	
deeds	 and	 forbids	 immorality;	 it	 is	 they	
who	are	the	successful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 tum	meiñ	ek	giroh	aisa	hona	chahiye	
ke	 bhalāi	 ki	 taraf	 bulāyeiñ	 aur	 achhi	 bāt	
ka	hukm	deiñ	aur	buri	bāt	se	mana	kareiñ	
aur	yehi	log	murād	ko	pahuñche

arabicText: وَلَا تَكُونُوا۟ كَٱلَّذِينَ تَفَرَّقُوا۟ وَٱخْتَلَفُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتُ ۚ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	 do	 not	 be	 like	 those	 who	 became	
divided	and	disputed	after	the	clear	signs	
had	 come	 to	 them;	 and	 for	 them	 is	 a	
terrible	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 tum	meiñ	ek	giroh	aisa	hona	chahiye	
ke	 bhalāi	 ki	 taraf	 bulāyeiñ	 aur	 achhi	 bāt	
ka	hukm	deiñ	aur	buri	bāt	se	mana	kareiñ	
aur	yehi	log	murād	ko	pahuñche

arabicText: وَلَا تَكُونُوا۟ كَٱلَّذِينَ تَفَرَّقُوا۟ وَٱخْتَلَفُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتُ ۚ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	 do	 not	 be	 like	 those	 who	 became	
divided	and	disputed	after	the	clear	signs	
had	 come	 to	 them;	 and	 for	 them	 is	 a	
terrible	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 tum	meiñ	ek	giroh	aisa	hona	chahiye	
ke	 bhalāi	 ki	 taraf	 bulāyeiñ	 aur	 achhi	 bāt	
ka	hukm	deiñ	aur	buri	bāt	se	mana	kareiñ	
aur	yehi	log	murād	ko	pahuñche

arabicText: يَوْمَ تَبْيَضُّ وُجُوهٌۭ وَتَسْوَدُّ وُجُوهٌۭ ۚ فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسْوَدَّتْ وُجُوهُهُمْ أَكَفَرْتُم بَعْدَ إِيمَـٰنِكُمْ فَذُوقُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
On	 the	 Day	(of	 Resurrection)	 when	 some	
faces	 will	 be	 shining	 and	 some	 faces	
black;	 so,	 (to)	 those	 whose	 faces	 are	
blackened,	 “What!	 You	 disbelieved	 after	
you	 had	 accepted	 faith!	 Therefore	 now	
taste	the	punishment,	the	result	of	your	disbelief.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jis	din	kuch	muñh	unjāle (raushan) hoñge	aur	kuch	muñh	kāle	to	woh	jin	ke	muñh	kāle	huwe	
kiyā	tum	Imān	lākar	kafir	huwe	to	ab	‘azāb	chakho	apne	kufr	ka	badla.

arabicText: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ٱبْيَضَّتْ وُجُوهُهُمْ فَفِى رَحْمَةِ ٱللَّهِ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
englishTranslationText: And	those	whose	faces	will	be	shining,	are	in	the	mercy	of	Allah;	they	will	abide	in	it	forever.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	jin	ke	muñh	unjāle (raushan) huwe	woh	Allah	ki	rahmat	meiñ	haiñ	woh	hamesha	us	
meiñ	raheiñ	ge	.

arabicText: تِلْكَ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱللَّهِ نَتْلُوهَا عَلَيْكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۗ وَمَا ٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ ظُلْمًۭا لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
These	are	the	verses	of	Allah,	which	We	recite	to	you	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad - peace	and	
blessings	be	upon	him),	with	truth;	and	Allah does	not	wish	any	injustice	to	the	creation.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	Allah	ki	āyateiñ	haiñ	ke	hum	theek-theek	tum	par	pardhte	haiñ	aur	Allah	jahān	wāloñ	par	
zulm	nahi	chāhta

arabicText: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ ٱلْأُمُورُ
englishTranslationText:
And	 to	Allah only	belongs	all	whatever	is	
in	 the	 heavens	and	all	whatever	is	in	 the	
earth;	 and	 towards	 Allah only	 is	 the	
return	of	all	matters.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	hi	ka	hai	jo	kuch	āsmānoñ	meiñ	
hai	aur	jo	kuch	zameen	meiñ	hai	aur	Allah	
hi	ki	taraf	sab	kāmoñ	ki	ruju'	hai.

arabicText: كُنتُمْ خَيْرَ أُمَّةٍ أُخْرِجَتْ لِلنَّاسِ تَأْمُرُونَ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ وَتَنْهَوْنَ عَنِ ٱلْمُنكَرِ وَتُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ ۗ وَلَوْ ءَامَنَ أَهْلُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ لَكَانَ خَيْرًۭا لَّهُم ۚ مِّنْهُمُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ وَأَكْثَرُهُمُ ٱلْفَـٰسِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
. You	 are	 the	 best	 among	 all	 the	 nations	
that	 were	 raised	 among	 mankind	 - you	
enjoin	 good	 deeds	 and	 forbid	immorality	
and	you believe	in	Allah;	and	if	the	People	
given	 the	 Book(s)	 believed	 it	 would	 be	
better	 for	 them;	 some	 of	 them	 are	
believers	(Muslims)	and	most	of	them	are	
disbelievers.	 (The	 best	 Ummah	 is	 that	 of	
Prophet	Muhammad - peace	 and	 blessings	
be	upon	him.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 behtar	 ho	 un	 sab	Ummatoñ	meiñ	jo	
logoñ	 meiñ	 zāhir	 huyiñ	 bhalāi	 ka	 hukm	
dete	 ho	 aur	 burāi se	 mana	 karte	 ho	 aur	
Allah	 par	 Imān	 rakhte	 ho	 aur	 agar	 kitābi	
Imān	lāte	to	unka	bhalā	tha	un	meiñ	kuch	
Musalman	haiñ	aur	ziyāda	kāfir

arabicText: لَن يَضُرُّوكُمْ إِلَّآ أَذًۭى ۖ وَإِن يُقَـٰتِلُوكُمْ يُوَلُّوكُمُ ٱلْأَدْبَارَ ثُمَّ لَا يُنصَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
They	cannot	harm	you	except	cause	some	
trouble;	and	if	they	fight	against	you,	they	
will	 turn	 their	 backs	 on	 you;	 then	 they	
will	not	be	helped.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	tumhāra	kuchh	na	bigādeñ	ge	magar	
yehi	 satāna	 aur	 agar	 tum	 se	 ladeiñ	 to	
tumhāre	 sāmne	 se	 peeth	 pher	 jāyeiñ	 ge	
phir	un	ki	madad	na	hogi

arabicText: ضُرِبَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلذِّلَّةُ أَيْنَ مَا ثُقِفُوٓا۟ إِلَّا بِحَبْلٍۢ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَحَبْلٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَبَآءُو بِغَضَبٍۢ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَضُرِبَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْمَسْكَنَةُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ يَكْفُرُونَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَقْتُلُونَ ٱلْأَنۢبِيَآءَ بِغَيْرِ حَقٍّۢ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا عَصَوا۟ وَّكَانُوا۟ يَعْتَدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Disgrace	 has	 been	 destined	 for	 them	 -
wherever	 they	 are	 they	 shall	 not	 find	
peace,	except	 by	a	 rope	 from	Allah and	a	
rope from	men	- and	 they	have	deserved	
the	wrath	of	Allah,	and	misery	is	destined	
for	 them;	 that	 is	 because	 they	 used	 to	
disbelieve	 in	 the	 signs	 of	 Allah,	 and	
unjustly	martyr	the	Prophets;	that	was	for	
their	disobedience	and	transgression.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Un	 par	 jama	 di	 gyi	 khuwāri jahāñ	 hoñ	
amān	 na	 pāyeñ	 magar	 Allah	 ki	 dor	 aur	
ādmiyoñ	 ki	 dor	 se	 aur	 ghazab-e-Ilāhi ke	
saza-wār	 huwe	 aur	 un	 par	 jama	 di	 gyi	
mohtāji	yeh	is	liye	ke	woh	Allah	ki	āyatoñ	
se	kufr	karte	aur	Paighambaroñ	ko	na	haq	shaheed	karte	yeh	is	liye	ke	na-farmān	bardār	aur	
sarkash	they

arabicText: ۞ لَيْسُوا۟ سَوَآءًۭ ۗ مِّنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ أُمَّةٌۭ قَآئِمَةٌۭ يَتْلُونَ ءَايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ ءَانَآءَ ٱلَّيْلِ وَهُمْ يَسْجُدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
All	 of	 them	are	 not alike;	among	 the	 People	given	 the	Book(s)	are	 some	who	are	 firm	 on	 the	
truth	- they	recite	the	verses	of	Allah in	the	night	hours	and	prostrate	(before	Him).
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Sab	ek	se	nahi	kitābiyoñ	meiñ	kuch	woh	haiñ	ke	haq	par	qāim	raheiñ	Allah	ki	Āyateiñ	padhte	
haiñ	rāt	ki	ghadiyoñ	meiñ	aur	Sajda	karte	haiñ

arabicText: يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَيَأْمُرُونَ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ وَيَنْهَوْنَ عَنِ ٱلْمُنكَرِ وَيُسَـٰرِعُونَ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
englishTranslationText:
They	accept	faith	in	Allah and	the	Last	Day,	and	enjoin	good	deeds	and	forbid	immorality,	and	
hasten	to	perform	good	deeds;	and	they	are	the	righteous.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	aur	pichle	din	par	 Imān	lāte	haiñ	aur	bhalāi	ka	hukm	dete	aur	burāi	se	mana	karte	haiñ	
aur	nek	kāmoñ	par	daudte	haiñ	aur	yeh	log	lāiq	haiñ	.

arabicText: وَمَا يَفْعَلُوا۟ مِنْ خَيْرٍۢ فَلَن يُكْفَرُوهُ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
englishTranslationText: And	they	will	not	be	denied	the	reward	of	whatever	good	they	do;	and	Allah knows	the	pious.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	woh	jo	bhalāi	kareiñ	un	ka	haq	na	māra	jāye	ga	aur	Allah	ko	ma'loom	haiñ	dar	wāle

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَن تُغْنِىَ عَنْهُمْ أَمْوَٰلُهُمْ وَلَآ أَوْلَـٰدُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيْـًۭٔا ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ ۚ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	 those	 who	 disbelieve	 - neither	
their	 wealth	 nor	 their	 offspring	 will	 help	
save	 them	 in	 the	 least,	 from	 Allah;	 and	
they	are	the	people	of	fire;	remaining	in	it	
forever
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jo	kāfir	huwe	un	ke	māl	aur	aulād	un	
ko	Allah	se	kuch	na	bachāyeñ	ge	aur	woh	
Jahannami	 haiñ	 un	 ko	 hameshā	 us	 meiñ	
rahna

arabicText: مَثَلُ مَا يُنفِقُونَ فِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا كَمَثَلِ رِيحٍۢ فِيهَا صِرٌّ أَصَابَتْ حَرْثَ قَوْمٍۢ ظَلَمُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ فَأَهْلَكَتْهُ ۚ وَمَا ظَلَمَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَلَـٰكِنْ أَنفُسَهُمْ يَظْلِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
The	 example	 of	 what	 they	 spend	 in	 this	
worldly	life	is	similar	 to	 the	 freezing	cold	
wind	 which	 struck	 the	 fields	 of	 a	 nation	
who	 wronged	 themselves,	 and	 destroyed	
it	 completely;	 and	 Allah did	 not oppress	
them,	 but	 it	 is	 they	 who	 wronged	
themselves
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kahawat	uski	jo	is	duniya	ki	zindagi	meiñ	
kharch	 karte	 haiñ	 us	 hawa	 ki	 si	 hai	 jis	
meiñ	 pālā	 ho	 woh	 ek	 aisi	 qaum	 ki	 kheti	
par	padi	jo	apna	hi	bura	karte	they	to	usey	
bilkul	mār	gayi	aur	Allah	 ne	 un	 par	 zulm	
na	 kiya	 hāñ	woh	 khud	 apni	jān	 par	 zulm	
karte	haiñ

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَتَّخِذُوا۟ بِطَانَةًۭ مِّن دُونِكُمْ لَا يَأْلُونَكُمْ خَبَالًۭا وَدُّوا۟ مَا عَنِتُّمْ قَدْ بَدَتِ ٱلْبَغْضَآءُ مِنْ أَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَمَا تُخْفِى صُدُورُهُمْ أَكْبَرُ ۚ قَدْ بَيَّنَّا لَكُمُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ ۖ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Do	not	share	your	
secrets	with	others	- they	do	all	 they	can	
to	 ruin	 you;	 they	 desire	 the	 maximum	
harm	 for	 you;	 enmity	 has	 been	 revealed	
from	 their	 speech,	and	what	 they	 hide	in	
their	 breasts	 is	 greater;	 we	 have	
explained	 the	 signs	 clearly	 to	 you,	 if	 you	
have	intelligence.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Imān	 wālo!	Ghairoñ	 ko	 apna	 rāz-dār		
na	banāo	woh	tumhāri	burāi	meiñ	(kami)	
nahi	karte	un	ki	ārzu	hai	jitni	iza	tumheiñ	
pahuñche	 bair	 (bughz)	 un	 ki	 bātoñ	 se	
jhalak	 utha	 aur	 woh	 jo	 seene	 meiñ	
chhupāye	 haiñ	 aur	 bada	 hai	 ham	 ne	
nishāniyāñ	 tumheiñ	 khol	 kar	 suna	 	 deiñ	
agar	tumheiñ	aql	ho.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَتَّخِذُوا۟ بِطَانَةًۭ مِّن دُونِكُمْ لَا يَأْلُونَكُمْ خَبَالًۭا وَدُّوا۟ مَا عَنِتُّمْ قَدْ بَدَتِ ٱلْبَغْضَآءُ مِنْ أَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَمَا تُخْفِى صُدُورُهُمْ أَكْبَرُ ۚ قَدْ بَيَّنَّا لَكُمُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ ۖ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Listen!	 It	is	 you	 who	love	 them	 and	 they	
do	 not	 love	 you,	 whereas	 the	 fact	 is	 that	
you	 believe	 in	 all	 the	 Books;	 when	 they	
meet	 you	 they	 say,	 “We	 believe”;	 and
when	 they	 are	 alone	 they	 chew	 their	
fingers	at	you	with	rage;	say,	“Die	in	your	
frenzy!”	Allah knows	well	what	lies	within	
the	hearts
romanUrduTranslationText:
Sunte	 ho!	 Yeh	 jo	 tum	 ho,	 tum	 to	 unheiñ	
chāhte	 ho	 aur	 woh	 tumheiñ	 nahi	 chāhte	
aur	hāl	 yeh	ke	 tum	sab	kitāboñ	par	 Imān	
lāte	 ho	 aur	 woh	 jab	 tum	 se	 milte	 haiñ	
kehte	 haiñ	 ham	 Imān	 lāye	 aur	 akele	 hoñ	
to	 tum	 par	 ungliyāñ	 chabayeiñ	ghusse	 se	
tum	 farmado	 ke	 mar	 jāo	 apni	 ghutan	
(Qalbi	jalan)	meiñ	Allah	khoob	jānta	hai	diloñ	ki	bāt.

arabicText: إِن تَمْسَسْكُمْ حَسَنَةٌۭ تَسُؤْهُمْ وَإِن تُصِبْكُمْ سَيِّئَةٌۭ يَفْرَحُوا۟ بِهَا ۖ وَإِن تَصْبِرُوا۟ وَتَتَّقُوا۟ لَا يَضُرُّكُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا يَعْمَلُونَ مُحِيطٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
If	 some	 good	 reaches	 you,	 they	 feel	
unhappy;	 and	 if	 misfortune	 befalls	 you,	
they	will	rejoice;	and	if	you	remain	steadfast	and	pious,	their	evil	scheme	will	not	harm	you	in	
the	least;	undoubtedly	all	what	they	do	is	encompassed	by	Allah.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Tumheiñ	koi	bhalāi	pahoñche	to	unheiñ	bura	lage	aur	tum	ko	burāi	pahuñche	to	us	par	khush	
hoñ	aur	agar	 tum	 sabr	aur	 parhez-gāri	 kiye	 raho	 to	 un	 ka	 dāoñ	 tumhāra	 kuchh	 na	 bigāde	ga	
beshak	un	ke	sab	kām	Khuda	ke	ghere	meiñ	haiñ

arabicText: وَإِذْ غَدَوْتَ مِنْ أَهْلِكَ تُبَوِّئُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ مَقَـٰعِدَ لِلْقِتَالِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
And	remember	O	dear	Prophet	(Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him)	when	you	came	
forth	from	your	house	in	the	morning,	appointing	the	believers	on	positions	of	battle;	and	Allah
is	All	Hearing,	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 yād	 karo	 aey	 Mehboob!	 Jab	 tum	 subah	 ko	 apne	 daulat	 khāne	 se	 bar-āmad	 huwe	
Musalmānoñ	ko	ladāi	ke	morchoñ	par	qāim	karte	aur	Allah	sunta	jānta	hai.

arabicText: إِذْ هَمَّت طَّآئِفَتَانِ مِنكُمْ أَن تَفْشَلَا وَٱللَّهُ وَلِيُّهُمَا ۗ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
When	 two	 groups	 among	 you	 almost	
decided	 to	show	cowardice	- and	Allah is	
their	 Protector;	 and	 in	Allah only	 should	
the	believers	trust.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jab	 tum	 meiñ	 ke	 do	 girohoñ	 ka	 irāda	
huwa	 ke	 na-mardi	 kar	 jāyeiñ	 aur	 Allah	
unka	 sambhālne	 wāla	 hai	 aur	
Musalmānoñ	 ko	 Allah	 hi	 par	 bharosa	
chāhiye.

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ نَصَرَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِبَدْرٍۢ وَأَنتُمْ أَذِلَّةٌۭ ۖ فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Allah indeed	aided	you	at	Badr	when	you	
had	no	means;	so	 fear	Allah - so	 that	you	
may	be	thankful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 beshak	 Allah	 ne	 badr	 meiñ	 tumhāri	
madad	 ki	 jab	 tum	 bilkul	 be	 saro	 sāman	
they	 to	Allah	se	daro	ke	kahiñ	 tum	shukr	
guzār	ho.

arabicText: إِذْ تَقُولُ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ أَلَن يَكْفِيَكُمْ أَن يُمِدَّكُمْ رَبُّكُم بِثَلَـٰثَةِ ءَالَـٰفٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ مُنزَلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
When	 you	 O	 dear	 Prophet	(Muhammad -
peace	 and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him)	 said	 to	
the	 believers,	 “Is	 it	 not	 sufficient	 for	 you	
that	 your	 Lord	 may	 support	 you	 by	
sending	down	three	thousand	angels?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jab	 aey	 Mehboob!	 Tum	 Musalmānoñ	 se	
farmāte	 they	 kiya	 tumheiñ	 yeh	 kāfi	 nahi	
ke	tumhāra	Rab	tumhāri	madad	kare	teen	
hazār	Farishte	utār	kar

arabicText: بَلَىٰٓ ۚ إِن تَصْبِرُوا۟ وَتَتَّقُوا۟ وَيَأْتُوكُم مِّن فَوْرِهِمْ هَـٰذَا يُمْدِدْكُمْ رَبُّكُم بِخَمْسَةِ ءَالَـٰفٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ مُسَوِّمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
. Yes,	why	not?	If	you	patiently	endure	and	
remain	pious,	and	 the	disbelievers	attack	
you	 suddenly,	 your	 Lord	 will	 send	 down	
five	thousand	marked	angels	to	help	you.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Hāñ	 kiyuñ	 nahi,	 agar	 tum	 sabr-o-taqwa	
karo	aur	kāfir	usi	dam	tum	par	ā padeiñ	to	
tumhāra	 Rab	 tumāri	 madad	 ko	 pāñch	
hazār	Firishtey	nishān	wāle	bheje	ga
